Author: attick, daemitus, alymphocyte, grammernatzi
Name: XIV Combo Expandedest
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. Plus extras.
Description:
This is an enhanced version of XIVCombo with a variety of new added features.
This is mutually exclusive with other XIVCombo versions, so make sure they do not conflict!
Changelog:
1.2.5.0: Player movement check optimized, range check added to Phlegma into Toxikon Feature.

1.2.4.9: Sage Phlegma/Toxikon Movement Features and Scholar Ruin 2 Movement Feature added.

1.2.4.8: Melee Distance Offset added for abilities that use it.
				 Redoublement Combo to Reprise Under-50 Option added.
  
1.2.4.7: Fixed issue with Dragon Clap feature always being on with Monk Experimental Combo.
  
1.2.4.6: Royal Authority to Holy Spirit compatibility with Atonement Feature fixed.

1.2.4.5: Royal Authority to Holy Spirit added.

1.2.3.8 to 1.2.4.4: Delay fixed on Raiju Switch feature, melee to ranged features added for every job that can make use of it.

1.2.3.5 to 1.2.3.7: Ninjutsu Double-Tap Feature added.
